quote: The dove did not find any resting-place to perch, so it returned to him into the ark because the waters were still covering the surface of the whole earth. So he reached his hand out and brought it inside the ark.
There was nothing in the Ark but the two stone tablets that Moses placed there at Hor πeb, when Jehovah made a covenant with the people of Israel while they were coming out of the land of Egypt.
But his disciples asked him what this illustration meant.
